title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: When I click on "OK" and then reopen the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The expected behavior is that the title of the hyperlink builder should always be "Hyperlink Options" and not change with settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Click on "OK" in the hyperlink builder. 
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected result: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
